item.title: Генератор кода HTML средствами PHP
item.content: <div><br></div><div><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman'; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Sed magna dolor, faucibus ac, iaculis non, cursus et, dui. Donec non urna.&nbsp;</span><div style="font-family: 'Times New Roman'; font-size: 16px;"><br></div><div style="font-family: 'Times New Roman'; font-size: 16px;"><img src="http://i.imgur.com/3PRCFwf.png" width="163"><br></div><div style="font-family: 'Times New Roman'; font-size: 16px;">Aliquam volutpat ornare augue.</div><div style="font-family: 'Times New Roman'; font-size: 16px;"><br></div><div style="font-family: 'Times New Roman'; font-size: 16px;">Phasellus egestas, nisl fermentum posdsdsdsdrttitor rutrum,&nbsp;</div><div style="font-family: 'Times New Roman'; font-size: 16px;"><br></div><div style="font-family: 'Times New Roman'; font-size: 16px;">magna metus rutrum risus, id&nbsp;</div><div style="font-family: 'Times New Roman'; font-size: 16px;">fringilla magna mi nec lorem.&nbsp;</div><div style="font-family: 'Times New Roman'; font-size: 16px;">Etiam eget metus sed justo ultricies rhoncus.&nbsp;</div><div style="font-family: 'Times New Roman'; font-size: 16px;"><br></div><div style="font-family: 'Times New Roman'; font-size: 16px;">Praesent rhosdncus arcu non dolor. Proin eu eros. Curabitur vehicula. Nulla vehicula lectus eget eros. Nulla vel nulla at dui dictum mollis. Etiam purus felis, pretium vel, eleifend id, consectetuer nec, pdsdsdurus. Vivamus pretium orci ac sapien. Etiam at tortor. Nunc tincidunt mi sed sapien. Etiam lacus pede, fermentum eu, blandit ac, congue eget, metus. Quisque sed sem. Mauris at sapien. Ut luctus.</div></div>
